Qué decir de este asombroso juego, o mejor dicho Half-Life en concreto...Creando el Motor Source®, que de ahí surgieron muchísimos juegos, mods, étcetera...
Mejoraron muchísimas cosas, este título fue la envidia de muchos, estamos hablando del año 2004, el cuál salió otro gran juego, GTA: San Andras, ¿Has visto sus gráficos?
La verdad orgulloso de Valve, sí...tiene un par de errores el juego, pero como dice el dicho..Nada es perfecto.
Half-Life 3 es algo lamentable la verdad, pero creo yo que el año que viene lo sacarán, y sí como todos lo dicen, el "Año que viene", pero está vez lo presiento a posta, solo queda esperar, otro excelente título.

Para mí 9+/10

[b] Life must be hard for a rebel. [/b]

Imagine this, youre in the post-apoctolyptic war, and all of your friends are out fighting the combine.
Meanwhile, you are scavenging the last bit of food you have and try to cook it in a rusty oven.

Then the window breaks.
 You look behind you and see a man with a suit on, holding a crowbar, and lots of weapons.
He takes out a gun and uses it to throw [i] all [/i] of your valubles on the wall, breaking them. He even steals some leftover ammo that took you months to find.
But before you load your gun, hes already gone. You just stand there. All your stuff that meant a lot to you is broken, or stolen. He even managed the raid the fridge. [spoiler] so you join your friends and probably die. [/spoiler]
this game is incredibly good i love it 10/10

Mesmo que o jogo seja lançado em 2005,cara é impresssionante o grafico.Principalmente se comparado aos titulos da epoca como Need For Speed Most Wanted,Grand Theft Auto San Andreas,Resident Evil IV entre outros.
O enredo é bom se esse é o seu primeiro half life,mas se vc ficar fã da saga e for jogar os jogos anteriores vc perceberá que o seu enredo é foda.Baseia-se no livro 1984,Cuja liberdade da humanidade é controlada pelo alto vigilanciamento e repressão do "Estado"(Como se fosse uma Coreia do Norte)
Outro ponto positivo do jogo que eu tenho que citar é a física;Mesmo depois de 12 anos,o jogo ainda possui uma das melhores física até hoje(Eu não estou brincando)Sendo que algumas puzzles do jogo envolve as mecanicas da física.
É um resumo bem simples mas eu recomendo completamente esse jogo,comprei ele apenas por causa do garry's mod e acabei tão viciado que comprei as respectivas dlc (Também recomendo se vc quer continuar a aventura).Vale cada centavo.

Half-Life 2 is a blockbuster addition to the HL franchise which really propelled the series into modern gaming. It stands as one of the best FPS games ever made because it delivers in almost every field. A Combination of crisp graphics along with the most robust shooting and movement mechanics you could ask for come courtsey of Valves Source engine which make even the most mundane actions intuitive and satisfying.

The story is told through the medium of an atmospheric dystopian world which has a lot of personality and is a joy to live in but this also brings me to my one negative point about the game. Much like the first game the plot is left open to interpretation and assumption due to a lack of lore material, which in my opinion leaves quite a hole in the general story. 

In otherwords, the only downside to this game is that there is not more of it to immerse yourself in, which is a problem that can be fixed by the additional episodes 1 & 2. Every gaming enthusiast needs to experience this game. 9/10

Jugué este juego un millón de veces cuando era niño, y aún así decidi volver a comprarlo a esta edad y de forma original, no me arrepiento, Half Life 2 sigue siendo el Shooter que todos aman, aquél que en su momento revolucionó todo, en su momento, increíble diseño gráfico, sigue teniendo una de las mejores historias en los videojuegos, repleta de misterios que aún no se resuelven a día de hoy, personajes inolvidables, una adictiva e increíble banda sonora, un juego que mezcla de todo y se convierte en una completa obra maestra, mi videojuego favorito sin dar muchas vueltas, es increíble.

10/10
Una obra de arte

Really damn good game. It's a linear game but in my opinion it does it right.

[b]Gameplay[/b]
The guns all feel really good and satisfying. Each gun has its strengths and its weaknesses so you'll be using pretty much all of them throughout the game. There's also the gravity gun but that's a different story. The game uses the engine's physics for combat, platforming and puzzles. What I really appreciated is that the game doesn't tell you what to do, and leaves you to figure out your way through the game on your own. This is not to say that it doesn't teach you the mechanics of the game, it just doesn't hold your hand at every step. The game is challenging enough, especially when it comes to some of the puzzles, however some of the enemy AI isn't always that smart rendering them fairly easy to fight.

[b]Story[/b]
The story is just above average, but the way it's delivered is superb. There are scripted events but no cutscenes, you're always in control which is more immersive. There are no story exposition moments and the story is not told directly, but rather shown and implied. The characters all feel real due to excellent voice acting and animations.

[b]Graphics[/b]
While it is a 16 year old game at the time I'm writing this, some of the scenery makes that hard to believe. I would confidently say it still holds up very well today. The great thing about the game being so old (and yet looking so good) is that the requirements to run it are super low so pretty much anyone can play it on any computer.

Overall: 8.5/10

When I say it completely flips the ending, I mean that it brings you new, enjoyable characters, a well liked team of developers and a great, creative storyline. I highly reccommend this game as I went on grinding when I should have been focusing more on the storyline while playing it.

In a time of games becoming more multiplayer based with no hype for a storyline, this game is the holy grail of storylines

真TM好玩的一款游戏，打人打僵尸打机器打异型，能开船还能开车，多看看几眼风景，多转转视角能让你晕得想吐。
讲道理我玩求生之路一点都不慌，玩“我们不去莱温霍姆”那章全程怕怕；摩托艇和侦察车真的好难开，一边开车一边开枪更难啊；外星人入侵后的地球一片衰败，看着心塞，还有我真的晕得想吐。
但是好游戏我一定要通关，多玩几次吧。

Rzeczywistość Half-Life’a to świat, w którym nauka wymyka się spod kontroli. Świat, w którym równoległość wymiarów zostaje naruszona i zaczynają się one przecinać ze sobą i przenikać w dramatyczny sposób. W drugiej części gry gracz wkracza weń ponownie w osobie doktora Gordona Freemana, znowu dane mu jest sięgnąć wzrokiem poza barierę czasu i miejsca, i tak samo zmuszony zostaje odłożyć na półkę laboratoryjny fartuch, a do ręki wziąć broń. I walczyć o życie ze wszystkim, co się rusza albo i udaje, że się nie rusza. Absolutnie ze wszystkim, gdyż potwory, które autorzy Half-Life’a 2 zaczerpnęli z nie-wiadomo-których wymiarów przerastają bodaj wszystko, z czym mogliśmy się zmierzyć minionymi laty w przeróżnych grach. Nie stajemy jednak oko w oko z niczym przerażającym ani chociażby dziwacznym ot, tak, na wejściu. Half-Life 2, identycznie jak jego poprzednik, z wolna, precyzyjnie dawkuje graczowi i adrenalinę, i zachwyty. Tu nic się nie dzieje na siłę i nawet jeśli gracz nie posiada wielkiej swobody w poruszaniu się po smutnym a fascynującym świecie przyszłości, wydaje się, że naprawdę rozwój sytuacji zależy od jego poczynań.
很不错
